channel.title: Comments on: XPages: Displaying a view inside a Dojo Dialog

item.title: By: Darin
item.dc:creator: Darin
item.description: <p>I am glad you are starting an xPages project. I have been working on one for about 2 months now and have found the answers to most things I have needed. Sorry, I don't have an answer to your issue. I did read something about dojo pulling it out of the form. I also read that IBM was working on getting this changed, but I am sure that will be down the road. If you have any other questions let me know and I will see what I can do to help you.</p>
item.content:encoded: I am glad you are starting an xPages project. I have been working on one for about 2 months now and have found the answers to most things I have needed. Sorry, I don’t have an answer to your issue. I did read something about dojo pulling it out of the form. I also read that IBM was working on getting this changed, but I am sure that will be down the road. If you have any other questions let me know and I will see what I can do to help you.
